item.title: O-Train Line 1 (Final Update)
item.description:
November 01 2019 -

Final Update 9:02am: Full service resumed on O-Train Line 1, residual delays of 5-10 minutes being experienced. We apologize for any inconvenience.

Update #2 8:47am: We are experiencing delays on Line 1 due to a switch issue. Trains running Blair to Lyon. R1 bus service between Tunney's Pasture and Lyon stations. Updates to follow.

Update #1 8:37: R1 Replacement bus service is running between Tunney's Pasture and Lyon stations due to a switch problem. Updates to follow.

8:29am: Line 1 trains will be serving the Eastbound platform at Lyon to Blair and Westbound platform at Lyon to Tunney's Pasture until further notice. Service continues to run. R1 buses will provide supplemental service between Tunney's Pasture and Lyon. Updates to follow.

item.title: Lycée Claudel Station: Elevator
item.description:
October 16 2019 -

Lycee NB elevator # 24:

The northbound elevator at Lycée Claudel Station is out of service for unforeseen maintenance. We expect the elevator to be out of service for a few days and regret any inconvenience this may cause.

Customers requiring the use of an elevator to access the southbound platform are advised to: take any northbound bus at stop 2A to Hurdman Station, cross over to the southbound side and take any southbound bus at stop 1D back to Lycée Claudel Station. Alternatively, you may also use the sidewalk outside the station and walk to Smyth Station.

For Travel Planning assistance, please call 613-741-4390 or press the free “Info” button on any Bell telephone in the station. For emergency assistance, use the nearest yellow emergency callbox.

Lycée SB elevator # 25:
The southbound elevator at Lycée Claudel Station is out of service for unforeseen maintenance. We expect the elevator to be out of service for a few days and regret any inconvenience this may cause.

Customers requiring the use of an elevator to access the northbound platform are advised to: take any southbound bus stop 1A to Smyth Station, cross over to the northbound side and take any northbound bus stop 2A back to Lycée Claudel Station.

For Travel Planning assistance, please call 613-741-4390 or press the free “Info” button on any Bell telephone in the station. For emergency assistance, use the nearest yellow emergency callbox.

item.title: Lycée Claudel Tunnel Closure
item.description:
July 29 2019 -

Starting Monday, Aug. 5, Lycée Claudel station will undergo repairs. During this time, the pedestrian tunnel will be out of service. A crosswalk will be setup on the south end of the platforms. A ramp to the Transitway level has been installed next to the station entrance. The tunnel is expected to reopen in late November or early December.

item.title: Elgin Full Closure From Laurier to Catherine
item.description:
May 07 2019 -

Starting 9am Monday, April 1, 2019, Elgin will be fully closed to traffic from Laurier to Catherine. Elgin should reopen later in 2019. The closure is part of the Elgin Street Renewal project. During this time, Routes 5 and 14 will be detoured. Routes 101 and 103 will not be affected.
